devdoc.author: Quentin Brunet, Pierre Piron, Lo Legron, Prescilla Lecurieux

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._weiAmount: (real currency amount to buy/sell in Wei)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract to challenge your trader friends with virtual coin. Real ether is needed to join competition.

closeCompetition().notice: Allow trader to close current competition. Start the next competition straight after.

forceCloseCompetition().notice: Allow owner to close current competition. Start the next competition straight after.

getBalances(uint256,address).notice: Get balances of a trader for a given competition.

getPrice().notice: Allow anyone to get real currency current price in Wei.

isCompetitionClosable().notice: Check if competition can be closed.

joinCompetition(uint256).notice: Allow trader to join a competition with a small participation fee.

leaveCompetition(uint256).notice: Allow trader to leave a competition (refund the participation fee).

trade(bool,uint256).notice: Allow trader to make a trader (buy or sell).

userdoc.notice: Student project, may contain bugs and security issues.
